mapper.select: select m.name, m.code, m.year, m.degrees, m.gender, m.avg_salary from academic_level as al join subject_category as sc on al.id = sc.academic_level_id join professional_class as pc on sc.id = pc.subject_category_id join major as m on pc.id = m.class_id where al.id = #{id} and (sc.id = 1 or sc.id = 13) and (pc.id = 1 or pc.id = 94)
